name: TheFellowshipPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open The Fellowship Podcast”
”Alexa, ask The Fellowship Podcast for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start The Fellowship Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the fellowship podcast
des: Listen to the latest teachings from Fellowship Missionary Church in Fort Wayne, Indiana. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
